attributes.action: Deport ANYONE living in this country with known links immediately.
attributes.background:
After recent events in nice and other places in the world I feel it is time to stop pussy footing around and stop all of this pandering to religious maniacs who are murdering people in the name of whoever thier favourite "invisible friend " 
Time to take back control of our nations security .

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
